attributes.action: libyan troops to leave bassingbourn barracks
attributes.additional_details:
There have been so many problems since the Libyan troops have come to Bassingbourn Barracks, Cambridgeshire, UK.

1) Three Libyan soldiers have been charged with sexually assaulting a women in Cambridge! http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/crime/11196829/Libyan-soldiers-preyed-on-women-while-training-in-UK-court-hears.html

2) local residents have been expressing their concerns that the Libyan soldiers have been causing problems on the barracks and the MoD have had to draft in more scots to help deal with the situation.

I think this is enough, how long is it until they start causing serious problems. Local residents feel unsafe in their OWN village, and they shouldn't feel like that!!!!

I THINK IT'S TIME TO SEND THEM GOME BEFORE SOMETHING SERIOUS REALLY HAPPENS!!!!!!
